metadata.Title: SoilTemperatureSWAT model
metadata.Extended description: Strategy implementing the SWAT method to compute soil temperature by layers. It updates daily layer temperatures using a lag coefficient and an exponential depth-damping function driven by soil profile depth, bulk density, volumetric water content, layer thickness, and the annual mean air temperature. Based on Neitsch et al., SWAT Theoretical Documentation (Version 2000).
metadata.Short description: Soil temperature by layers computed with the SWAT method using a lag and depth-damping approach.
